channel.title: [req]Signature
channel.description:
I'm not much of a gfx artist, so I was wondering if someone could make me a pretty signature... Doesn't have to be of any specif theme, just has to be nice, cool and stylish Just surprise me, and erm, dunno what the dimensions are these days, but I'd like something not too big in height...
Ok, i need a nice picture for my Forum, with my name in it Name is: 0BbY Can someone make it for me? I dont care what one, it need to be a cool one
Thanks, 0BbY/Moerin

item.title: [req]Signature
item.dc:creator: @moerin moerin
item.description:
@moerin wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:2, topic:179734”]Here you go, I just kind of messed around with it for a couple minutes. If I had more time I’d make you something better. That’s just me being bored. If you want, I can remove the black border on it. I personally like it better without the border. But it’s you’re choice.

[/quote]
Thanks dude, your the best

Read full topic

item.description:

the only problem i have with that is the circle is not centered so it is annoying the hell outta me.

Also so you have no specific style you want? so it could be anything? ill probably make something just screwing around tomorrow and post it…
